Ydrassil:

Internals alarms ran and Ydrassil knew that someone was 
inside "Slag"coursed the male he took BlackStorm and he locked down 
inside an emtpy quarter after did that he oepened com link with 
maximals and said "Maximals!!! Someone have been came in base... We 
should search and capture the intruder before he scapes"

Ydrassil ran, looking for the indtruder.
